name: Boomshine Plus
description:
In each level you have the task to catch a certain amount of the moving dots by starting a chain reaction. Choose wisely where to start it!

• 105 varied levels
• up to 1000 dots per level

5 different types of special dots, each with special abilities for new fun:

• white dots: you get an extra starting shot
• blue dots: remain permanent and the other dots bounce off
• orange dots: remain permanent and the other dots explode on them
• green dots: you have to catch these dots to complete the level
• red dots: you must not catch these dots, because... you'll see :-)

Additional content: finish all levels and unlock the ultimate hard mode!
